name: DEADNAME [Proof of Concept Build]
description:
[A] and [D] to Move Left and Right

[SPACE] to Jump

[W] to Use Doors

[S] to drop down from Platforms

[R] to Reload

[I] to toggle inventory

[Left click] to Fire

[Hold Right click] to Aim

[Hold Control] to enter "Command Mode" (allows you to command units)

While in "Command Mode" use [Left click] to select Units

While in "Command Mode" use [Right click] to move selected units

E interacts with objects you are physically near to your player character and that your mouse cursor is above (Doors for example)

[F11] toggles Fullscreen
